body.p: “On the decayed part of the butt end there were curious fine black lines “,” giving it a geographical look “,” here and there “,” half a dozen inches long “,” sometimes following the line of the rings; the boundary of a part which had reached a certain stage of decay.”
PE 10, pg. 87-88 / 4 January-23 April 1856 / NNPM MA 1302:26 / T vol. # XX / PDF # XIV / JVIII
